category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 12 (Health Management Workers)
contents: Article 12 (Health care workers) ① Health care workers refer to health managers and health care officers, and can be composed in accordance with the following items. Revised 2021. 12. 22., 2022. 12. 16., 1. Health manager: A person qualified for Article 21 of the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act, 2. Health affairs officer: Head of each department and branch manager at the headquarters, ② Health managers are the following: Performs duties., 1. Assisting the management manager with regard to technical matters related to health among the duties of the management manager stipulated in Article 9, Paragraph 2, and providing guidance and advice to the management supervisor, 2. Establishment of a health examination plan for Corporation workers. and implementation management, 3. Tasks stipulated in each subparagraph of Article 22, Paragraph 1 of the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act, ③ Health affairs officers perform the following tasks: 1. Establishment and management of health examination plans for employees, 2. Other Matters pertaining to the prevention of health disorders of employees and management of the office environment; ④ Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the management supervisor shall act on behalf of the health officer in his or her absence.
